property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {bsp.code} as serialProducts, {order:code} as code, {bsp.ocLocation} as ocLocation, {cs.code} as status FROM {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {BlSerialProduct as bsp}, {ConsignmentStatus as cs},{AbstractOrder as order} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c.pk} AND {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND {cs.code} = 'RECEIVED_READY_TO_SHIP' AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({bsp.pk},'%')) AND {c:order} = {order:pk} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?optimizedShippingStartDate,110) AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {bsp.code} as serialProducts, {order:code} as code, {bsp.ocLocation} as ocLocation, {cs.code} as status FROM {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {BlSerialProduct as bsp}, {ConsignmentStatus as cs},{AbstractOrder as order} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c.pk} AND {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND {cs.code} != 'RECEIVED_READY_TO_SHIP' AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({bsp.pk},'%')) AND {c:order} = {order:pk} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?optimizedShippingStartDate,110) AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {c.code} as consignmentCode, {order:code} as orderNumber,{order:rentalEndDate} as rentalEndDate, {serial.ocLocation} as ocLocation, {serial.code} as serialProductCode,{cs.code} as consignmentStatus, {order.consolidatedOrderNote} as orderNote, {order.pickUpPersonFirstName} as FirstNameOfPickUpPerson, {order.pickUpPersonLastName} as LastNameOfPickUpPerson FROM {Consignment as c} ,{AbstractOrder as order},{OrderTypeEnum as ot},{ConsignmentStatus as cs},{BlSerialProduct as serial},{ConsignmentEntry as ce} where {ce:consignment} = {c:pk} AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {c.order} = {order.pk} AND {order.orderType} = {ot.pk} AND {ot.code} = 'FD' AND {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND (CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?optimizedShippingStartDate,110) OR {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} >= ?optimizedShippingStartDate) AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse AND {order.pickUpPersonFirstName}=?pickUpPersonFirstName AND {order.pickUpPersonLastName}=?pickUpPersonLastName"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {c.code} as consignmentCode, {order:code} as code, {order.rentalEndDate} as rentalEndDate FROM {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentStatus as cs}, {AbstractOrder as order} WHERE {c.status} = {cs.pk} AND {cs.code} = 'READY_FOR_SHIPPING' AND {c:order} = {order:pk} AND {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} >= ?optimizedShippingStartDate AND {c.warehouse} =?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {orderItem:orderNumber} as orderNumber, {orderItem:orderType} as orderType, case when({orderItem:isVIPOrder} = 1) then 'True' else 'False' end as isVIPOrder, case when({orderItem:isUsedGearOrder} = 1) then 'True' else 'False' end as isUsedGearOrder, {orderItem:orderNotes} as orderNotes, {orderItem:productId} as productId, {orderItem:productName} as productName, {orderItem:serialNumber} as serialNumber, case when({wh:code} = 'warehouse_ca') then 'CA' else 'MA' end as warehouseCode, {orderItem:parentLocation} as parentLocation, {orderItem:childLocation} as childLocation, {orderItem:shippingMethod} as shippingMethod, {orderItem:shipDate} as shipDate, {orderItem:employeeName} as employeeName FROM {ReadyToShipOrderItem as orderItem}, {Warehouse as wh} WHERE {orderItem:warehouse} = {wh:pk} AND {orderItem:warehouse} = ?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {order:code} as orderNumber, {ot:code} as orderTypeFlag, case when({order:isVipOrder} = 1) then 'Yes' else 'No' end as isVipOrder, case when({order:isRentalOrder} = 1) then 'No' else 'Yes' end as isUsedGearOrder, {order.consolidatedOrderNote} as orderNotes, {b:code} as productCode, {b:name} as productName, {serial:code} as serialNumber,{serial:barcode} as barcode, {ware:code} as warehouseCode, {serial:lastLocationScanParent} as ocParentLocationCode, {serial:ocLocation} as ocLocationCode, case when({serial:dirtyPriorityStatus} = 1) then 'Yes' else 'No' end as serialDirtyPriorityFlag from {BlProduct as b}, {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {BlSerialProduct as serial}, {AbstractOrder as order}, {OrderTypeEnum as ot}, {Warehouse as ware} where {serial.dirtyPriorityStatus} = 1 and {b.pk} = {serial:blProduct} and {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) and {c:pk} = {ce:consignment} and CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?currentDate,110) and {c:warehouse} = {ware:pk} and {ware:pk} = ?warehouse and {order:pk} = {c:order} and {ot:pk} = {order:orderType} and {serial:barcode}=?itemBarcode"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {order:code} as orderCode, {ot:code} as orderType, case when({order:isVipOrder} = 1) then 'True' else 'False' end as isVipOrder, case when({order:isRentalOrder} = 1) then 'False' else 'True' end as isUsedGearOrder, {order:consolidatedOrderNote} as consolidatedOrderNote, {p:code} as prodCode, {p:name} as prodName, {serial:code} as serialCode, {wh:code} as warehouseCode, {serial:lastLocationScanParent} as parentLocationCode, {serial:ocLocation} as locationCode, {dm:name} as shippingMethod, {order:rentalEndDate} as orderReturnDate FROM {Order AS order JOIN Consignment AS c ON {order.pk}={c.order} }, {BlSerialProduct as serial}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {AbstractOrderEntry as oe}, {Product as p}, {Warehouse as wh}, {DeliveryMode as dm}, {OrderTypeEnum as ot} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c:pk} AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {oe:product} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({p.pk},'%')) AND {ce:orderEntry} = {oe.pk} AND {c:deliveryMode} = {dm.pk} AND {c:warehouse} = {wh.pk} AND {wh:pk} = ?warehouse AND {c:cleanCompleteConsignment} = 1 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?shipdate,110) AND {ot:pk} = {order:orderType}"

property.name: query
property.value: "SELECT {order:code} as orderCode, {ot:code} as orderType, case when({order:isVipOrder} = 1) then 'True' else 'False' end as isVipOrder, case when({order:isRentalOrder} = 1) then 'False' else 'True' end as isUsedGearOrder, {order:consolidatedOrderNote} as consolidatedOrderNote, {p:code} as prodCode, {p:name} as prodName, {serial:code} as serialCode, {wh:code} as warehouseCode, {serial:lastLocationScanParent} as parentLocationCode, {serial:ocLocation} as locationCode, {dm:name} as shippingMethod FROM {Order AS order JOIN Consignment AS c ON {order.pk}={c.order} }, {BlSerialProduct as serial}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {AbstractOrderEntry as oe}, {Product as p}, {Warehouse as wh}, {DeliveryMode as dm}, {OrderTypeEnum as ot} WHERE {ce:consignment} = {c:pk} AND {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {oe:product} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({p.pk},'%')) AND {ce:orderEntry} = {oe.pk} AND {c:deliveryMode} = {dm.pk} AND {c:warehouse} = {wh.pk} AND {wh:pk} = ?warehouse AND {c:cleanCompleteConsignment} = 0 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?shipdate,110) AND {ot:pk} = {order:orderType}"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {s:code} as serialCode, {s:barcode} as barcode, {o:code} as orderNumber, {s:ocLocation} as ocLocation, case when({s:dirtyPriorityStatus} = 1) then 'Yes' else 'No' end as isPrioritySerial from {BlSerialProduct as s}, {Order as o}, {Consignment as c} where {s:serialStatus} IN ({{select {sse:pk} from {SerialStatusEnum as sse} where {sse:code} in ('REPAIR_NEEDED','PARTS_NEEDED') }}) and {o:pk} = {s:associatedOrder} and {c:pk} = {s:associatedConsignment} and {c:warehouse} = ?warehouse"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {s:code} as serialCode, {no:code} as newOrderCode, {s:ocLocation} as ocLocationCode, {sse:code} as itemStatusCode, {pvos:code} as previousOrderStatus, {s:lastUnboxedOcLocationDate} as unboxedDate from {BlSerialProduct as s},{SerialStatusEnum as sse}, {Order as pvo}, {OrderStatus as pvos},{Order as no},{Consignment as c} where {s:serialStatus} IN ({{select {sse:pk} from {SerialStatusEnum as sse} where {sse:code} = 'UNBOXED'}}) and {sse:pk} = {s:serialStatus} and {pvo:pk} = {s:associatedOrder} and {pvos:pk} = {pvo:status} and {sse:pk} = {s:serialStatus} and {c:pk} = {s:associatedConsignment} and {c:warehouse} = ?warehouse and {no:pk} IN ({{select {so:pk} from {BlSerialProduct as ss},{Order as so}, {Consignment as sc}, {ConsignmentEntry as sce} where {ss:serialStatus} IN ({{select {ssse:pk} from {SerialStatusEnum as ssse} where {ssse:code} = 'UNBOXED'}}) and {sce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({ss.pk},'%')) and {sc:pk} = {sce:consignment} and {so:pk} = {sc:order} and {so:orderReturnedToWarehouse} = 0}})"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {s:code} as serialCode, {dm:name} as shippingMethod, {no:code} as nextOrderCode, {s:ocLocation} as currentOcLocation, {sse:code} as serialStatus, {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} as shippingDate, {pos:code} as previousOrderStatus, {s:lastUnboxedOcLocationDate} as unboxedDate from {BlSerialProduct as s}, {SerialStatusEnum as sse}, {Order as po}, {Order as no}, {OrderStatus as pos}, {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce}, {DeliveryMode as dm} where {s:serialStatus} IN ({{select {sse:pk} from {SerialStatusEnum as sse} where {sse:code} = 'UNBOXED'}}) and {s:dirtyPriorityStatus} = 1 and {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({s.pk},'%')) and {po:pk} = {s:associatedOrder} and {pos:pk} = {po:status} and {sse:pk} = {s:serialStatus} and {c:pk} = {ce:consignment} and CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?currentDate,110) and {c:warehouse} = ?warehouse and {no:pk} = {c:order} and {dm:pk} = {no:deliveryMode}"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {s:code} as serialCode, {no:code} as nextOrderCode, case when({no:isVipOrder} = 1) then 'Yes' else 'No' end as isVipOrder ,{s:ocLocation} as currentOcLocation, {sse:code} as serialStatus, {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} as shippingDate, {pos:code} as previousOrderStatus, {s:lastUnboxedOcLocationDate} as unboxedDate from {BlSerialProduct as s}, {SerialStatusEnum as sse}, {Order as po}, {Order as no}, {OrderStatus as pos}, {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce} where {s:serialStatus} IN ({{select {sse:pk} from {SerialStatusEnum as sse} where {sse:code} = 'UNBOXED'}}) and {s:dirtyPriorityStatus} = 1 and {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({s.pk},'%')) and {po:pk} = {s:associatedOrder} and {pos:pk} = {po:status} and {sse:pk} = {s:serialStatus} and {c:pk} = {ce:consignment} and CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?currentDate,110) and {c:warehouse} = ?warehouse and {no:pk} = {c:order} and {no:isVipOrder} = 1"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {s:code} as serialCode, {no:code} as nextOrderCode,{s:ocLocation} as currentOcLocation, {sse:code} as serialStatus, {c:optimizedShippingStartDate} as shippingDate, {s:lastUnboxedOcLocationDate} as unboxedDate from {BlSerialProduct as s}, {SerialStatusEnum as sse}, {Order as no}, {Consignment as c}, {ConsignmentEntry as ce} where {s:testingStatus} = ({{select {tse:pk} from {ItemTestingStatusEnum as tse} where {tse:code} = 'TESTING_NEEDED'}}) and {ce:serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({s.pk},'%')) and {sse:pk} = {s:serialStatus} and {c:pk} = {ce:consignment} and CONVERT(VARCHAR,{c:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?currentDate,110) and {c:warehouse} = ?warehouse and {no:pk} = {c:order}"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {pvo:code} as orderCode,{pvos:code} as previousOrderStatus,{s:code} as serialCode, {s:ocLocation} as ocLocationCode, {sse:code} as itemStatusCode, {s:lastUnboxedOcLocationDate} as unboxedDate from {BlSerialProduct as s},{SerialStatusEnum as sse}, {Order as pvo}, {OrderStatus as pvos},{Consignment as c} where {s:serialStatus} IN ({{select {sse:pk} from {SerialStatusEnum as sse} where {sse:code} IN ('UNBOXED')}}) and {sse:pk} = {s:serialStatus} and {pvo:pk} = {s:associatedOrder} and {pvos:pk} = {pvo:status} and {pvos:code} IN ('UNBOXED_COMPLETELY') and {sse:pk} = {s:serialStatus} and {c:pk} = {s:associatedConsignment} and {c:warehouse} = ?warehouse ORDER BY {s:lastUnboxedOcLocationDate} DESC"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {ord.code} as orderCode ,{con.code} as consignmentCode , {package.inBoundTrackingNumber},{con.optimizedShippingEndDate} ,{package.returningDate} from {PackagingInfo as package} ,{Consignment as con} ,{Order as ord} where {package.consignment} = {con.pk} AND {con.Order} = {ord.pk} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{con:optimizedShippingEndDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?endDate,110) AND {isScrapeScanCompleted} = 1"

property.name: query
property.value: "select {serial.code} as SerialProductCode, {rc.optimizedShippingEndDate} as SerialReturningDate, {nc.optimizedShippingStartDate} as SerialShippingDate , {status.code} as SerialStatus from {PackagingInfo as package},{PackagingInfo as npackage},{Consignment as rc} ,{BlSerialProduct as serial} ,{Consignment as nc} ,{SerialStatusEnum as status} where {package.serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {package.isScrapeScanCompleted} = 1 AND {rc.pk} = {package.consignment} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{rc.optimizedShippingEndDate} ,110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?shippedDate,110) AND {npackage.serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {serial.serialStatus} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({status.pk},'%')) AND {nc.pk} = {npackage.consignment} AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{nc:optimizedShippingStartDate},110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?shippedDate,110) "

property.name: query
property.value: "select {serial.code} as SerialProductCode, {rc.optimizedShippingEndDate} as SerialReturningDate, {status.code} as SerialStatus from {PackagingInfo as package},{Consignment as rc} ,{BlSerialProduct as serial} ,{SerialStatusEnum as status} where {package.serialProducts} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({serial.pk},'%')) AND {rc.pk} = {package.consignment} AND {package.isScrapeScanCompleted} = 1 AND CONVERT(VARCHAR,{rc.optimizedShippingEndDate} ,110) = CONVERT(VARCHAR,?dateShipped,110) AND {serial.serialStatus} LIKE CONCAT('%',CONCAT({status.pk},'%'))"
